#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Search prices. Filter use.


= Details =

To search prices for any commodity just enter _station name_ and/or _commodity name_ into appropriate fields.
Any value can be entered by *any part* of it. You may use '%' as wildcard symbol for substring, i.e 'L%4' will found 'LHS 3447' and 'LTT 18486'. By default search working as '<search string>%'.
